Row: Percentage CV
Column: PredictionLength
Chart: windowLength

averages = Average Difference between index estimated by cross-validation and actual minimum realized risk

bestPercentage = index of best percentage for cross-validation
0 = not tested
1 = 3.33%
2 = 6.66%
3 = 10%
4 = 16.66%
5 = 20%
6 = 33.33%
